General.Name: Jiangsu Rijiu Optoelectronics Joint
General.Description: Jiangsu Rijiu Optoelectronics Jointstock Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sales of touch display application materials. It offers conductive film products, including high and low square resistance ITO conductive film, copper film, EMI film, and MITO film products; optical film products, such as optical decorative films and 2A/3A film products; and optical adhesive products comprising full stick and frame stick OCA optical adhesive products. The company was formerly known as Kunshan Rijiu New Energy Applied Materials Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Jiangsu Rijiu Optoelectronics Jointstock Co., Ltd in January 2015. Jiangsu Rijiu Optoelectronics Jointstock Co., Ltd. was founded in 2010 and is based in Kunshan, China.
